fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.simulators

Class HIOA_AtomicEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.SimulationEngine
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.AtomicEngine
        • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.simulators.HIOA_AtomicEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventsExchangingI, ModelDescriptionI, ParentNotificationI, VariablesSharingI, SimulationManagementI, SimulatorI, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HIOA_AtomicRTEngine

    public class HIOA_AtomicEngine
extends AtomicEngine
implements VariablesSharingI
    The class HIOA_AtomicEngine implements the atomic simulation engine for HIOA DEVS simulation models.

    Description

    The major additions from the standard atomic engine target the continuous variables management, both at composition, initialisation and run time.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2018-07-02

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      return true if this model imports the designated variable.
      boolean isOrdered()
      return true if the model has a precedence relationship with some other models that imposes particular processing, like the production/consumption of variables imposing an order in their initialisation.
      boolean isTIOA()
      return true if the HIOA model is a TIOA i.e., has no exported or imported variables (TIOA imports and exports only events).
      void setImportedVariableValueReference(java.lang.String modelURI, java.lang.String sinkVariableName, java.lang.Class<?> sinkVariableType, Value<?> value)
      search among descendant HIOA of the model with URI modelURI all of the the atomic ones that use the designated variable or its aliases and set in them the reference to the placeholder for its value.
      void showCurrentStateContent(java.lang.String indent, Duration elapsedTime)
      print the content of the current state, without pre- and post-formatting.
      void staticInitialiseVariables()
      initialise the internal data structures of the atomic HIOA model from the static information about the model variables; this method must be called immediately after creating an atomic HIOA model and before composing it with other models i.e., is an integral part of the model creation protocol.

      • getActualExportedVariableValueReference

        public Value<?> getActualExportedVariableValueReference(java.lang.String modelURI,
                                                        java.lang.String sourceVariableName,
                                                        java.lang.Class<?> sourceVariableType)
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ModelDescriptionI
        search among descendant HIOA of the model with URI modelURI the atomic one that defines the designated variable or its alias and return the reference to the placeholder for its value.

        Contract

         pre     modelURI != null
 pre     sourceVariableName != null
 pre     sourceVariableType != null
 post   true            // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        getActualExportedVariableValueReference in interface ModelDescriptionI
        Overrides:
        getActualExportedVariableValueReference in class AtomicEngine
        Parameters:
        modelURI - URI of the model that exports the designated variable.
        sourceVariableName - name of the sought variable.
        sourceVariableType - type of the sought variable.
        Returns:
        the reference to the placeholder for the value of the designated exported variable.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        See Also:

      • staticInitialiseVariables

        public void staticInitialiseVariables()
        Description copied from interface: VariablesSharingI
        initialise the internal data structures of the atomic HIOA model from the static information about the model variables; this method must be called immediately after creating an atomic HIOA model and before composing it with other models i.e., is an integral part of the model creation protocol.

        Contract

         pre    true            // no precondition.
 post   true            // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        staticInitialiseVariables in interface VariablesSharingI
        See Also:
        VariablesSharingI.staticInitialiseVariables()
